channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Scroll To Top
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Scroll To Top

item.title: CVE-2022-2710|2024-08-03T00:46:03.416Z -- unknown -- scroll%20to%20top
item.description: The Scroll To Top WordPress plugin before 1.4.1 does not escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
